scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:ui && npm run setup:api && npm run setup:models
scripts.install:all: concurrently -n ui,api -c green,blue "npm run install:ui" "npm run install:api"
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n ui,api -c green,blue "npm run start:ui" "npm run start:api"
scripts.gen:all: npm run gen:api && npm run gen:ui
scripts.migrate:dev: dotenv -e ./models/.env -- atlas schema apply -c file://models/atlas.hcl --env gorm  --auto-approve
scripts.migrate:prod: dotenv -e ./models/.env -- atlas migrate apply -c file://models/atlas.hcl --env gorm
